Test Name: Adaptor Protein 3 Beta2 (AP3B2) Antibody, Tissue Immunofluorescence Titer, Spinal Fluid
Purpose: To quantify AP3B2 antibody titer in spinal fluid via tissue immunofluorescence for diagnostic evaluation.
Equipment: Fluorescence microscope, centrifuge, refrigerator (2–8 °C), optional humidity-controlled chamber
